column2: Organize Military Exercises with your Tagma troops in order to maintain their discipline and effectiveness in combat

§YSalaries to Military Officials cost§! §R[Root.roman_administration_total_salary_cost.GetValue]§! §Yper month§!.\n We have [global_roman_administration_tagma_king_title_count.GetValue] Tagma Commanders costing [Root.roman_administration_tagma_salary_cost.GetValue] monthly.\n We have [global_roman_administration_strategos_king_title_count.GetValue] Strategos costing [Root.roman_administration_strategos_salary_cost.GetValue] monthly.
We receive 10 ducats monthly from our official post.
We receive 20 ducats monthly from our official post.
